description:
With their new found friend, Kan`u and friends decide to work at a restaurant in order to cover their traveling expenses.  However, Chōhi was no good at it, and decided earn money another way where she meets Bachō.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chouhi, Bachou to Aiutsu no Koto
張飛, 馬超と相打つのこと
